item.title: How do i chance this to this i have pics!
item.dc:creator: @damien_b damien b
item.description:
@damien_b wrote:

sprites folder in your source

Then right click and click “Edit with paint” then put the desired picture (Make sure its the same size)

Read full topic

item.title: How do i chance this to this i have pics!
item.dc:creator: @starstorm starstorm
item.description:
@starstorm wrote:

and it has to be the same type of file as the one originaly used so if its png which it probably is, open ur one that u want in paint then save as the same name in the folder that the old ones in and save it as the same type of image file. it should replace it… but i have no idea why u would want that one, its kinda like downgrading

Read full topic
item.source: How do i chance this to this i have pics!

item.title: How do i chance this to this i have pics!
item.dc:creator: @str_o_tek str o tek
item.description:
@str_o_tek wrote:

team boy:

some 1 help??

Duh. It’s in the Sprites (or spirts) folder, you can find it in the client folder. It’s most common to find it in the “Files” folder, or in the cache’s folder.
Search through all the files in paint untill u find the right one and replace it with the wanted picture.

Read full topic
